name: Color Control (bmin)
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 200 with the theme 'Control the Environment.'

Survive growing waves of color ghosts by changing the color under their feet using your flood fill skill! Collect as many stars as you can before your eventual demise.

 W,A,S,D - Move

Shift- Sprint

Space - Flood Fill

Q,E - Cycle through Colors

Please excuse the programmer art.

Music- 8 Bit Retro Funk by David Renda
